text: Fixed Ideals is the second studio album by British band Muncie Girls. It was released on 31 August 2018 through Specialist Subject Records. ==Critical reception== Fixed Ideals was met with "generally favorable" reviews from critics. At Metacritic, which assigns a weighted average rating out of 100 to reviews from mainstream publications, this release received an average score of 80 based on 7 reviews. Aggregator Album of the Year gave the release a 78 out of 100 based on a critical consensus of 14 reviews. ==Accolades== {|class="sortable wikitable" |- ! Publication ! Accolade ! Rank ! class="unsortable"| |- | The A.V.
